titles.title: Technology Workforce Framework Act of 2024
Technology Workforce Framework Act of 2024

A bill to expand the functions of the National Institute of Standards and Technology to include workforce frameworks for critical and emerging technologies, to require the Director of the National Institute of Standards and Technology to develop an artificial intelligence workforce framework, and periodically review and update the National Initiative for Cybersecurity Education Workforce Framework for Cybersecurity, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
